# The monthly indoorCO2map.com summary

## Buildings

```{r}

unmod_df <- autocruller::ac_get_co2("web") |> 
    dplyr::filter(dplyr::between(
        lubridate::floor_date(date, unit = "month"),
        lubridate::today() |> lubridate::floor_date(unit = "month"),
        lubridate::today() |> lubridate::ceiling_date(unit = "month")
    ))
long_df <- autocruller::ac_unnest_longer(unmod_df)
```

This month there were `r nrow(unmod_df)` measurements of `length(unique(unmod_df$combined_id))` unique buildings.
